body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Sanchez Motors. My name is Jason Sanchez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Tiffany. Can I have your phone number so we can reach you easily if needed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my number is five five five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you provide your email address as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is ttorres@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Tiffany. Is there anything specific you need help with today regarding our inventory?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling frustrated because I can't find the car model I'm looking for.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Tiffany. Let me assist you with that. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Tiffany. If you have any other questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Jason. Have a great day too.
